faq.title: Answers for curious readers
faq.description: Quick help for your book questions, submissions, and events.

submit.question: How can I submit my book?
submit.answer: Visit our submissions page and upload your manuscript as a PDF or Word file. Our editors will review and respond within 4–6 weeks.

newBooks.question: Where are new books listed?
newBooks.answer: Browse the homepage or Books section for the latest releases. Filter by category, age, or popularity to find new titles.

events.question: Do you host author or reader events?
events.answer: We offer author talks, signings, and workshops. See the Authors & Events page for upcoming dates and details.

newsletter.question: How do I get the newsletter?
newsletter.answer: Subscribe at the bottom of any page to receive updates on new books, events, and exclusive content.

about.heroTitle: We believe stories shape the way we see the world.
about.heroDescription: We are an independent publishing house dedicated to discovering, nurturing, and sharing meaningful stories for readers of all ages. From children's books to thoughtful fiction, we publish with care, intention, and a deep respect for storytelling.
about.philosophyDescription: Publishing is not about speed or volume — it's about trust. We build long-term relationships with authors, editors, and readers, believing that meaningful books deserve time, attention, and care.

storyFirst.title: Story first
storyFirst.description: We believe great books start with honest, well-crafted stories that resonate long after the last page.

inclusiveVoices.title: Inclusive voices
inclusiveVoices.description: We champion diverse perspectives and believe publishing should reflect the richness of the world we live in

craftedWithCare.title: Crafted with care
craftedWithCare.description: From manuscript to final print, every detail matters. We work closely with authors to do their stories justice.

contact.heroDescription: Whether you're a reader, an author, or a potential partner, we'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
